name: SuperThief (MakhamDev)
description:
Hey! Thief!!!

Oh No! There used to be so many people. Now it just thieves everywhere!

Looks like its time for our hero... SUPERTHIEF!!!!

Stealing from thief is not wrong, right?

GO SUPERTHIEF GOOO!!!!

Collect the loot and back in the van!

Control:
  • WASD : Move
  • Space : Dash
  • Left click : Fire
